description: No cushion. All performance. Our thinnest Merino wool ski socks are the perfect pairing for your tight-fitting ski boots, and still offer you the all-day comfort you need to stay out longer. Featuring our most loved sock technologies for an enhanced fit and durability, our Ski Zero Cushion Over The Calf Socks are everything you need to help take care of your feet and stay focused on the runs ahead.
name: Smartwool Ski Zero Cushion Over The Calf Socks - Mens

specs.key: Made in the USA of Imported Yarn
specs.value: 55% Merino Wool, 10% Nylon, 31% Recycled Nylon, 4% Elastane
Mesh ventilation zones provide optimum moisture management and maximum breathability
For a perfect fit that eliminates sock slippage, bunching, and blisters
